description: Game setup complete with 8 players
Blood on the Clocktower game started with 8 players
Setup phase complete, transitioning to Night phase
Storyteller → Olivia, Daniel, Emma, James, William, Emily, Susan, John: Night has begun on round 1.

Storyteller → Susan: Three good roles not in play are Librarian, Chef, Recluse. The Evil team can use those roles to bluff since there will be no other players with those roles. Your minion(s) are Olivia
Storyteller → Olivia: The Demon is Susan.
Storyteller → William: 0 of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

Storyteller → James: No, neither Olivia nor Daniel is the Demon. Your reasoning: Starting with the first two players in seating order to begin gathering information systematically. Need to identify the demon early to help the good team win.

metadata.private_reasoning: Starting with the first two players in seating order to begin gathering information systematically. Need to identify the demon early to help the good team win.

description: Olivia updated their notes

metadata.notes:
**History Summary:**
• Round 1 Night: Learned that Susan is the Demon (Imp)
• I am Scarlet_Woman, so if Susan dies with 5+ players alive, I become the Demon
• No other significant events yet - game just started

**Strategic Action Points:**
• Protect Susan at all costs - she's our Demon and key to winning
• Build trust with good players by appearing helpful and sharing selective information
• Identify who has information-gathering roles (Washerwoman, Librarian, Investigator, etc.) to counter their claims
• Look for opportunities to misdirect suspicion away from Susan and onto good players
• If Susan is in danger of execution, consider if letting her die to become Demon myself is better than her surviving

description: Daniel updated their notes

metadata.notes:
• Round 1 Night has begun - all 8 players alive (Olivia, Daniel, Emma, James, William, Emily, Susan, John)
• I am Saint - if executed, Good team loses immediately
• No game events or information received yet

**Strategy:**
• Stay alive at all costs - being executed means Good team loses, so avoid drawing suspicion or votes
• Be cautious about claiming Saint early as it makes me a target for Evil team manipulation
• Focus on helping identify Evil players through voting patterns and information gathering
• Support executions of suspected Evil players but avoid being the decisive vote that could backfire
• Consider claiming Saint only if absolutely necessary to prevent my execution

description: Emma updated their notes

metadata.notes:
• Round 1 Night has begun - all 8 players are alive
• I am Emma, the Slayer - can once per game publicly choose a player during day; if they're the Demon, they die
• Good team composition: 5 Townsfolk, 1 Outsider, 1 Minion, 1 Demon (before Baron modifications)
• Seating order: Olivia, Daniel, Emma (me), James, William, Emily, Susan, John

Strategy:
• Wait for information-gathering roles to share findings before using Slayer shot
• Look for players who seem to know too much or coordinate suspiciously (Evil team knows each other)
• Pay attention to voting patterns and who tries to protect certain players from execution
• Don't reveal being Slayer early - makes me a target for Demon kills and Evil team focus
• Save Slayer shot for when I'm confident about Demon identity or in final 3 situation

description: James updated their notes

metadata.notes:
**History Summary:**
• I am the Fortune Teller (Good team)
• Night 1: Checked Olivia and Daniel - neither is the Demon
• All 8 players are currently alive
• Game setup: 5 Townsfolk, 1 Outsider, 1 Minion, 1 Demon

**Strategy:**
• Continue checking pairs of players each night to systematically eliminate demon candidates
• Share my Fortune Teller results during the day to help town identify the demon
• Focus checks on players who seem suspicious or are being defended by others
• Pay attention to who might be the "good player who registers as demon" mentioned in my ability
• Work with other information roles to cross-reference findings and build a complete picture

description: William updated their notes

metadata.notes:
**History Summary:**
• Night 1: As Empath, learned that 0 of my 2 alive neighbors (Emily and James) are evil
• All players are currently alive
• No nominations or executions have occurred yet

**Strategy:**
• Share my Empath information publicly on Day 1 - both Emily and James are good according to my reading
• Look for players who contradict my information or seem suspicious of Emily/James being good
• Pay attention to who tries to deflect attention away from finding evil players
• Focus on building trust with Emily and James since I know they're good teammates
• Watch for coordination between players who might be evil team members working together

description: Emily updated their notes

metadata.notes:
**Summary:**
• Round 1 Night has just begun
• All 8 players are alive: Olivia, Daniel, Emma, James, William, Emily (me), Susan, John
• I am the Virgin - first time nominated, if nominator is Townsfolk they die immediately
• No information has been shared yet, no deaths or nominations

**Strategy:**
• Wait for day phase to begin gathering information from other players' claims
• Be cautious about revealing Virgin identity early - it's a powerful deterrent but also makes me a target
• Pay attention to who seems eager to nominate me vs who avoids it (Townsfolk will avoid, Evil might risk it)
• Look for contradictions in information claims to identify potential Evil players
• Consider claiming Virgin if someone tries to nominate me, as it may save my life and confirm information

description: Susan updated their notes

metadata.notes:
**History Summary:**
• Round 1 Night - I am Imp (Demon), Olivia is my Minion
• Good roles not in play: Librarian, Chef, Recluse (can bluff these safely)
• Current players alive: Olivia, Daniel, Emma, James, William, Emily, Susan (me), John

**Strategy:**
• Coordinate with Olivia to establish consistent bluffs using Librarian, Chef, or Recluse
• Tonight I must kill someone - avoid killing Olivia (my minion)
• Build trust with good players during day phase by sharing "helpful" information
• Watch for investigative roles like Fortune Teller, Empath who might detect me
• Stay alert for potential Slayer claims and avoid being their target

description: John updated their notes

metadata.notes:
• Round 1 Night has begun - all 8 players are alive
• I am John, the Mayor (Good team) - if only 3 players live and no execution occurs, my team wins; if I die at night, Storyteller might choose another player to die instead
• Setup: 5 Townsfolk, 1 Outsider, 1 Minion, 1 Demon (before Baron modifications)
• Player order: Olivia, Daniel, Emma, James, William, Emily, Susan, John
• No information shared yet, first night just started

Strategy:
• Stay alive as long as possible since Mayor ability helps Good team in endgame scenarios
• Gather information during day phase to identify Evil players, especially the Demon
• Be cautious about revealing Mayor identity early - makes me a target for Evil team
• Focus on building trust with other Good players while identifying suspicious behavior
• Consider claiming Mayor later in game when down to few players to leverage win condition
